main event: A bright, round, green-yellow object was observed moving erratically in the sky over Milan, Italy on June 12, 1957.
interesting points: The object approached from the east, changed direction, then disappeared below the horizon after about 17 minutes.
The witness, a 32-year-old man who worked as a foreign correspondent, reported that the object suddenly appeared and interrupted the course of clouds.
The object was described as very bright, glowing, and revolving or rising before it disappeared.
The witness delayed reporting the incident because he knew the U.S. was the only organization interested in the UFO problem.
The sighting occurred on an exceptionally clear day at around 7:30 PM local time.
